name: BbblShtr | Classic Bubble Shooter
description:
Classic Bubble Shooter Game

Play the classic bubble shooter game
Pick the game type that suits you best - varying from very easy to extremely difficult
Aim with better precision using the magnifiying glass

+ classic bubble shooter game
+ magnifying glass for precision aiming
+ total 6 difficulties
+ play in portrait and landscape orientation
+ option: bubbles with symbols

To use the magnifying glass:
1. aim towards a bubble and hold your finger
2. drag into position
3. tap to shoot
Tap outside the magnifying glass to cancel

This game is free to play.
A single in-app purchase will get rid of the occasional ad between games.

Download BbblShtr now!
